    SOURCES OF QUOTES
    Quotations translated from the French and Dutch were taken from the following sources:

    The Complete Letters of Vincent van Gogh. 3 vols. Greenwich, Connecticut: 1958. [Reprinted Boston: 2000].

    Fondation Pierre Gianadda, Martigny (Switzerland). Gauguin. Exh. cat. by Ronald Pickvance. Martigny: 1998.

    Van Gogh, Vincent. The Letters of Vincent van Gogh. Selected and edited by Ronald de Leeuw. Translated by Arnold Pomerans. London: 1996.

    National Gallery of Art, Washington, D.C. The Art of Paul Gauguin. Exh. cat. by Richard Brettell et al. Washington, D.C.: 1988.

    Prather, Marla, and Charles Stuckey. Gauguin: A Retrospective. New York: 1987.
